en: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
The criminals will be known by their marks,
and they will be seized by the forelocks.
and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
They will circulate between it and scalding water,
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
